      • check

        public Check check(CheckType checkType,
          CheckSettings checkSettings,
          CheckInformation checkInformation,
          DocumentCheckSettings documentCheckSettings)
            throws UserMetaDataIncompleteException,
                   AuthorizationFailedException,
                   InvalidCheckConfigurationException,
                   CheckFailedException
        non-blocking
        Specified by:
        check in interface CheckAdapter
        Parameters:
        documentCheckSettings -
        checkType - The CheckType is a compound of different aspects of a Check.
        • The CheckType.CheckPriority decides if the Check is prioritized higher or lower.
        • The CheckType.CheckResultType defines which output should be created by the Acrolinx Server.
        • Also meta information could be defined.
        checkSettings - The CheckSettings for this Check. Keep in mind that only supported operations could be performed.
        See: CheckAdapter.getCapabilities()
        Create via: AcrolinxFactory.checkSettings()
        checkInformation - The CheckInformation for this Check. It contains the Document to check and also various check related information.
        Create via: AcrolinxFactory.checkInformations()
        Returns:
        A new instance of Check.
        Throws:
        UserMetaDataIncompleteException
        AuthorizationFailedException
        InvalidCheckConfigurationException
        CheckFailedException

      • check

        public Check check(CheckSettings checkSettings,
          CheckInformation checkInformation,
          DocumentCheckSettings documentCheckSettings)
            throws UserMetaDataIncompleteException,
                   AuthorizationFailedException,
                   InvalidCheckConfigurationException,
                   CheckFailedException
        Description copied from interface: CheckAdapter
        Starts a new normal Check like you know from other plug-ins tool bar. The
        Specified by:
        check in interface CheckAdapter
        Parameters:
        checkSettings - The CheckSettings for this Check. Keep in mind that only supported operations could be performed.
        See: CheckAdapter.getCapabilities()
        Create via: AcrolinxFactory.checkSettings()
        checkInformation - The CheckInformation for this Check. It contains the
        documentCheckSettings - The DocumentCheckSettings defining document-related check settings like SEO keywords.
        Returns:
        A new instance of Check.
        Throws:
        UserMetaDataIncompleteException - the user meta data incomplete exception
        AuthorizationFailedException - the authorization failed exception
        InvalidCheckConfigurationException - the invalid check configuration exception
        CheckFailedException - the check failed exception Check itself runs not blocking, but Check.getCheckResult() blocks.
        Note: If you want to execute a custom check, with different result, in background or with additional meta information call: CheckAdapter.check(CheckType, CheckSettings, CheckInformation, DocumentCheckSettings) Document to check and also various check related information.
        Create via: AcrolinxFactory.checkInformations()

      • getLanguageLocalizations

        Returns:

      • aggregateCheckReports

        public Aggregation aggregateCheckReports(Collection<CheckResult> checks)
                                  throws AuthorizationFailedException,
                                         NoSuchCheckResultException
        Description copied from interface: CheckAdapter
        Aggregate check reports of different checks to one aggregated check report. This method may or may not be blocking, depending on the used server version. This method does not block, if you use current server-versions (supporting checking service >= v5). All checks have to be performed at the same instance of Acrolinx server. We recommend to submit the aggregation closely after the checks are successfully performed.
        Specified by:
        aggregateCheckReports in interface CheckAdapter
        Parameters:
        checks - the checks to aggregate the check reports
        Returns:
        the aggregation object for the aggregation task.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationFailedException
        NoSuchCheckResultException
